Description of incident: "In June 2016, the official website of Evony gaming suffered a massive data breach in which 33,407,472 of its registered user accounts were stolen.  Things couldn't go worse when in August 2016, the gaming site suffered another data breach on its forum in which 938,000 of its registered accounts were stolen. "The information compromised included usernames, email addresses, passwords and IP addresses.More Information: https://www.hackread.com/evony-gaming-company-website-hacked/
